mapper.select: select b.BOARD_SEQ as boardSeq ,b.TITLE as title ,DATE_FORMAT(b.FIRST_UPDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as fUpdate ,DATE_FORMAT(b.LAST_UPDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as lUpdate ,u.USER_ID as userId from BOARD b left join user u on b.USER_SEQ = u.USER_SEQ

select B.BOARD_SEQ ,B.USER_SEQ ,U.USER_NAME ,B.TITLE ,B.CONTENT ,(CASE WHEN INSTR(DATE_FORMAT(B.FIRST_UPDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), 'PM') > 0 THEN REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(B.FIRST_UPDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), 'PM', '오후') ELSE REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(B.FIRST_UPDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), 'AM', '오전') END) AS FIRST_UPDATE ,(CASE WHEN INSTR(DATE_FORMAT(B.LAST_UPDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), 'PM') > 0 THEN REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(B.LAST_UPDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), 'PM', '오후') ELSE REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(B.LAST_UPDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), 'AM', '오전') END) AS LAST_UPDATE ,B.IP from BOARD B left join USER U on U.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ where BOARD_SEQ = #{seq}
